title: Missing vfx for Kennen
body: Kennen is missing his vfx on lightning rush. When the ball lightning effect fades, there is supposed to be additional sparks smitted. I dont have a screenshot, but its easy to compare  the ability preview in-client and in-game to see the difference.

replies.body: Thanks for the report, beany! Gonna look into this. Looks like those particles should exist as indicators to his armor/mr buff.
